text: Teemu Mikael Tainio (born 27 November 1979) is a Finnish football coach and former player. He is the head coach of Tallinna Kalev and an assistant coach of the Finland national football team. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Teemu Tainio, worldfootballTeemu Tainio, Finnish FA Appearances
